Also, is it as simple as just adding the website url, or is there a synt

it's one of those archive sites with a list of directories. No instructional information at all. But I'll just try adding the url to sources.list. And my guess is that I need to uncomment the sources already in there.
apt-get works by checking all the listed repositories for the package you requested; if the package isn't in ubuntu's standard repositories, it'll just move down the list
don't forget to apt-get update after adding a repo so that apt-get knows to use it
